item.description:
At the request of a few running members....an earlier start time would be better....so we can get a bit
more daylight on the farmington bike path. I set the time for 6 p.m. ....Monday and Wednesday instead.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a silver Jeep Cherokee with decals on rear window. We can meetup at the parking lot area of Pier One. P.S. I hope everyone's Easter holiday was good with plenty of food, and fun.
item.name: Lets Run a slower paced 3 miler in Hamden,CT
